title: Gather client's requirements
description: The first priority in the project management is to define, in the clearest terms possible, what the client wants.

title: Project planning
description: Now we start a rough drafting and prototyping the clients requirements. If any changes needed we make changes

title: Building
description: In the build phase of a website project, our team focused on creating the siteâ€™s layout, content, design and functionalities.

title: Optimization
description: From optimizing cross-browser performance to compressing image files, this is the phase where your team brings the website up to the highest standards it can

title: Finalization
description: This phase of website project management is relatively complex. We starting initial testing, go live, foundational marketing/SEO activities

title: Launch
description: Finally, after completing the tasting and other staffs, we are close to launch the produce or handover it to you
